entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 04:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of thundershowers early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
